title.rendered: Music Industry Is About More Than Just Talent

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”3_5″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.15″]

Here’s a blunt way to start off: Those who are working toward a career in music and performing are up for a sad reality. It’s extremely difficult to make it big in the music industry, let alone make a solid living. There aren’t many singers and performers who are capable of creating a financial living and comfortable life from their talent, no matter how good they are.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button _builder_version=”3.19.15″ button_text=”Read More” button_url=”https://www.laweekly.com/music/the-music-industry-is-about-more-than-just-talent-ask-vocal-star-10128952″ url_new_window=”on” button_alignment=”center” /][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″][et_pb_image _builder_version=”3.19.15″ src=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/celebrity_experience_7-15-17.jpg” alt=”Music Industry Is About More Than Just Talent” /][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
